products.title: Lace Lift Up Teddy Black
products.body_html:
With a sensual, elevated blend of lace and mesh, our Teddy is made to be seen, in public or private. Wear it on its own at home or with your favorite jeans and heels for a night out—it’s a bodysuit that does both. And well. 
For the perfect fit, select your usual Pepper Size.
Unsure? Try a few sizes on at home or take our Size Quiz.

Materials:
Lace: 81% Polyamide, 19% Elastane.
Mesh: 82% Polyamide, 18% Elastane.
Made sustainably in Colombia.

products.title: Signature Lace Bikini Black Cherry
products.body_html:
Sheer lace with delicate scalloped edges, the Signature Lace Bikini was designed to complement our Signature All You Bra and Signature Unlined Demi Bra for a sophisticated matching set.

Sizing:
XXS (00-0), XS (0-2), S (2-4), M (6-8), L (10-12), XL (14)

Materials:
Gusset: 100% Cotton.
Mesh: 84% Polyamide, 16% Elastane.
Lace: 89% Nylon, 11% Spandex.

Made ethically in Sri Lanka. OEKO-TEX® certified.

Final sale.

products.title: Softlife Modal Wirefree Bra Sand
products.body_html:
We’d say it’s comfy, but that’d be a massive understatement. Meet the SoftLife Modal Wirefree Bra. Our best-selling, wirefree bra that’s made with Modal, a cooling, breathable fabric that comes from rapidly renewable Austrian beech trees. So you can feel good in it, and even better about it. 

Featuring an insanely great fit and feel, this ultra-flattering, super-supportive bra hugs you in all the right places, and features convertible racerback straps for maximum wearability. 

Sizing:
XXS (30A, 30B), XS (32AA, 32A, 32B), S (34AA, 34A, 34B), M (36AA, 36A 36B), L (38AA, 38A, 38B), XL (40AA, 40A)

Materials:
Modal: 92% Lenzing Micro Modal, 8% Elastane.

Made sustainably in Colombia. OEKO-TEX® certified.

products.body_html:

products.title: Smooth Lace Bikini Slate Leo
products.body_html:
It’s about time your 🍑 got a little Pepper love, too. Meet our Smooth Lace Bikini undies: Designed with peekaboo lace panels that pair perfectly with your Pepper bra, and super soft fabrics that hug you in all the right places.

Sizing:
XXS (00-0), XS (0-2), S (2-4), M (6-8), L (10-12), XL (14).

Materials:
Body: 75% Polyamide, 25% Elastane. OEKO-TEX® certified.
Lace: 82%  Polyamide, 18% Elastane 
Gusset: 100% Cotton. OEKO-TEX® certified.

Made ethically in Colombia.

Final sale.
tags: card_description: Silky-soft body hugging bikini with a smoothing lace

products.title: Athlux Legging Midnight
products.body_html:
Our athleisure line has expanded to include a full-length legging for more mix-and-match possibilities. The Athlux Legging has a high-rise waistline with a 27-inch inseam to extend down to the ankle.

The soft, super-stretchy, relaxed ribbed fabric hugs your curves and moves with you—wherever you go. Smoothing and versatile, it's ideal for yoga, light workouts and running errands, and stylish enough to wear out. Designed with great stretch and recovery so you can wear it again (and again).

Machine wash cold. Do not bleach. Lay flat to dry. Do not iron or dry clean.

Sizing:
XXS (00-0), XS (0-2), S (2-4), M (6-8), L (10-12), XL (14). Fits snug.

Materials:
85% Nylon 15% Elastane.

Made sustainably in Mexico.
tags: card_description: A full-length legging made of premium ribbed fabric that stretches and moves with you.

products.title: Lace Lift Up Bra Ecru
products.body_html:
The Lace Lift Up Bra gives you ultra-flattering, zero gap lift for the days when you’re feeling *extra*. This romantic style is adorned with classic lace details and a silky fabric for the band, making it irresistibly smooth and comfy against your skin. Lift what you’ve got without feeling like less.  

Fits true to size. We recommend your usual bra size. Unsure? Try a few sizes on at home or take our size quiz.

Materials: 
Body: 75% Polyamide, 25% Elastane. OEKO-TEX® certified.
Lace: 82%  Polyamide, 18% Elastane.

Made sustainably in Colombia.

products.title: Lift Up Bra Noir Dot
products.body_html:
Finally, a push up bra that doesn't make you feel like less. Meet the Lift Up Bra that gives you ultra flattering, comfy, zero gap lift for the days when you're just feeling *extra*. This is a push up bra that highlights what you already got and always feels like you. 

Fits true to size. We recommend your usual bra size. Unsure? Try a few sizes on at home or take our size quiz.

Materials:
Body: 75% Polyamide, 25% Elastane.
Mesh: 96% Polyamide, 4% Elastane.

Made sustainably in Colombia & Sri Lanka. OEKO-TEX® certified.

products.title: Fine Mesh Thong Buff
products.body_html:
It’s about time your 🍑 got a little Pepper love, too. Our Fine Mesh Thong is made from an all-over sheer mesh fabric for that barely-there, airy feeling. Designed to pair perfectly with your Pepper bra.

Sizing:
XXS (00), XS (0), S (2-4), M (6-8), L (10-12), XL (14). 

Materials:
Gusset: 100% Cotton.
Body: 96% Polyamide, 4% Elastane.

Made sustainably in Colombia. OEKO-TEX® certified.

Final sale.
tags: card_description: Minimal coverage in an all-over sheer mesh

products.title: Classic All You Bra Noir Dot
products.body_html:
This ultra comfy, ultra sleek bra features buttery-soft fabrics and silky smooth trims that will become a classic staple underneath every outfit. No more awkward bra gaps, uncomfortable push up padding, or feeling like your body’s not enough.

How is the Classic All You Bra different from the Mesh All You Bra?

  • Smoother look under shirts. The cups and mesh layer aren't attached for a more flexible fit.
  • Buttery, silky fabric for the band
Fits true to size. We recommend your usual bra size. Unsure? Try a few sizes on at home or take our Size Quiz.

Materials:
Body: 75% Polyamide, 25% Elastane.
Mesh: 96% Polyamide, 4% Elastane.

Made sustainably in Colombia. OEKO-TEX® certified.

products.title: MeMoí Thigh High Stockings Nude
products.body_html:
The perfect finishing touch. Our MeMoí thigh high stockings are beautifully sheer and give your legs a flattering and flawless look. You'll get the comfort and advantage of stockings with an au natural appearance. 

Product Care: Machine wash cold in mesh laundry bag with like colors. Do not bleach or iron. Lay flat to dry. Do not bleach. Do not iron. 

Materials: 84% Nylon, 16% Spandex.

Final sale.

products.title: Embroidery Garter Belt Le Fleur
products.body_html:
Designed to pair perfectly with our Embroidery String Thong, the Embroidery Garter Belt is the ultimate finishing touch on our most romantic set yet. With scalloped edges that echo the delicate embroidery of the Le Fleur collection, it hugs the waist, features a hook-and-eye back closure, and adjustable garter straps for the perfect blend of elegance, ease, and comfort.

Stockings are not included.

Materials:
100% Polyamide.

Made ethically in Colombia.

products.title: Signature Lace Garter Bisou
products.body_html:
Designed to pair perfectly with our Signature Unlined Demi Bra and Signature Lace Bikini, the Signature Lace Garter completes our most romantic set yet. The scalloped edging matches the delicate lace detailing of the Signature collection, and it sits at the waist with a hook and eye back closure and adjustable garter straps.

Stockings are not included.

Sizing:
S/M, L/XL

Materials:
Lace: 89% Polyamide, 11% Elastane.

Made ethically in Colombia. OEKO-TEX® certified.

products.title: Signature All You Bra Bisou
products.body_html:
Consider it your new everyday essential — the best bra for small boobs, perfected. No more awkward cup gaps, bulky push up padding, or feeling like your body's not enough. What makes the Signature All You Bra so comfortable and flattering for AA-B cups? Ultra flattering body-hugging fit and contouring lift you love, now with soft lace detailing. The scalloped lace neckline adds a sophisticated touch and is smooth under clothing.

Fits true to size. We recommend your usual bra size. Unsure? Try a few sizes on at home or take our Size Quiz.

Materials:
Lace: 89% Polyamide, 11% Elastane.

Made sustainably in Sri Lanka. OEKO-TEX® certified.

products.body_html:

products.body_html:
If you loved our Signature Unlined Demi, wait until you see it in Le Fleur embroidery. With the same flattering frame and unlined cups, this elegant silhouette, adorned with delicate, bespoke embroidery, delivers a sheer, irresistible allure designed to help you feel your absolute best. 

Fits true to size. We recommend your usual bra size. Unsure? Try a few sizes on at home or take our size quiz.

products.title: Modal Wirefree Bra Sand
products.body_html:
When less is more. Made from premium Lenzing Modal — Finally, a fabric that is as eco-friendly as it is luxurious.

Our best rated style, this is the best-fitting essential wirefree bra using natural fibers that's super plush against the skin. Lenzing Modal is made from Austrian beech trees, known for its breathable and cool-to-the-touch qualities. Also features convertible straps for racerback.

Sizing: XXS (30A, 30B), XS (32AA, 32A, 32B), S (34AA, 34A, 34B), M (36AA, 36A 36B), L (38AA, 38A, 38B), XL (40AA, 40A)

Materials: 92% Lenzing Modal, 8% Elastane. Removable cups.

Made ethically in Colombia.
tags: card_description:Our luxuriously soft eco-friendly wirefree bra in a gentle beige
